title: America Loss
description: Follow the journey of two groups seeking refuge, during a Russian invasion of the United States of America. They navigate through many perils during the Invasion, encounteringâ€”violence, murder, rape and mayhem. Their survival is dependent on their skills, street smarts and their relationships. Some relationships are steamier than others. This story is full of romance, personality clashes, God-Complexes and sex.
author: Ki Love
